comment.body: nice set of blogs you have. i might do the same, separate my blogs once i have more posts. i wish i knew russian or mandarin that way i can read those content. but i am glad you can write in english, i like to see how people from other countries feel and think. check my blog some times http://127.0.0.1:43110/165Aqxg5KpezsmV9oPTajHfUdZoXr8LVvb/
